line_1: Right bless'd the man who free from bitter bale,
line_2: No loud contention doth his ears assail,

line_1: Nor ever had she known such bitter bale,
line_2: While thus she gazed, her quivering lips turn pale;

line_1: Explore the beauties of each living bale.
line_2: Who, whilst their feeble frames scarce stand the gale,

line_1: Withouten That would come an heavier Bale,
line_2: For, though sometimes it makes thee weep and wail,

line_1: Withouten That would come an heavier Bale,
line_2: Loose Life, unruly Passions, and Diseases pale.
